org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction

Class TieredCompactionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.AbstractCompactionStrategy
      • org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.TieredCompactionStrategy

  • public class TieredCompactionStrategy
extends org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.AbstractCompactionStrategy
    Provides tiered compaction for tables. The 'config' parameter must be specified, and must refer to a tiered storage configuration defined in dse.yaml

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.AbstractCompactionStrategy
